Articles.Content:
Hi Ksp community.

Today when i tried to move my ksp game from my HDD to my SDD, i encountered a strange issue. The savegames i had in the "Saves" folder, did not match the ones i had in-game.

I must say at this point in time i had about 6 mods, which all worked fine. So when i am in-game, i can load my save and stuff, but when i go to my saves folder it only shows up to quicksave #7, and i have to about 17

Any idea what is wrong?

Huh. Weird. All I can think is use the Windows file search tool to look for one of the quicksaves you're missing in the file system but can still see in-game.

They've got to be somewhere!

If playing a game from a protected Windows folder, you'll often find save files and configuration files in a hidden applications folder instead of where you'd expect.

Usually it's something like C:\users\username\application\_data(this is hidden)\Kerbal Space Program...

Don't forget to enable viewing of hidden files and folders ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
